attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: (optional) Disables the accordion item, locks expand/collapse.

attributes.name: expanded
attributes.description: (optional) Whether the accordion item is expanded.

attributes.name: header-text
attributes.description: (required) The text to render in the header.

attributes.name: icon
attributes.description: (optional) The icon to display before the header text.

attributes.name: size
attributes.description: (optional) The size of the action items.

attributes.name: visible-item-count
attributes.description: (optional) Total number of icons to show

attributes.name: dismissible
attributes.description: (optional) Whether the alert has a dismiss button

attributes.name: type
attributes.description: (optional) The type of alert, sets the color and icon to render

attributes.name: clearable
attributes.description: Whether the input has a clear button.

attributes.name: disable-close-on-select
attributes.description: Whether the autocomplete's options always display on select.

attributes.name: include-search-icon
attributes.description: Whether the search icon is included.

attributes.name: multiple
attributes.description: When enabled, multiple options can be selected in the component. And selected options are shown as chips in the input.

attributes.name: show-no-results-found-message
attributes.description: Whether to show the no results found message.

attributes.name: show-options-on-focus
attributes.description: Whether to show autocomplete's options when focus.

attributes.name: underline-links
attributes.description: (optional) A flag that controls the display of underline

attributes.name: icon-only
attributes.description: (optional) Takes the icon name and renders an icon-only button.

attributes.name: left-icon
attributes.description: (optional) Takes the icon name and shows the icon aligned to the left of the button text.

attributes.name: right-icon
attributes.description: (optional) Takes the icon name and shows the icon aligned to the right of the button text.

attributes.name: show-caret
attributes.description: (optional) Shows a caret icon right side of the button.

attributes.name: button-style
attributes.description: (optional) The style of the buttons in the group

attributes.name: color
attributes.description: (optional) The color of the buttons in the group

attributes.name: border-radius
attributes.description: (optional) The border radius of the card.

attributes.name: show-card-border
attributes.description: (optional) A flag that controls the display of border.

attributes.name: show-shadow-on-hover
attributes.description: (optional) A flag that controls the display of shadow box when the element is hovered.

attributes.name: stop-propagation
attributes.description: (optional) If you wish to prevent the propagation of your event, you may opt for this.

attributes.name: has-error
attributes.description: (optional) Whether the chip has an error.

attributes.name: max-width
attributes.description: (optional) Maximum width for the Chip's text and shows ellipsis when truncated

attributes.name: show-close
attributes.description: (optional) Whether to show the close icon.

attributes.name: allowed-chars-regex
attributes.description: (optional) Regular expression to allow characters while typing the input.

attributes.name: alt-formats
attributes.description:
Alternative formats string for the date input split by | separator.
Use 'm','mm' for month, 'd','dd' for date and 'yy','yyyy' for year with any separator that is not a regular expression.

attributes.name: disable-validation
attributes.description: (optional) Disables default validation for the date input.

attributes.name: error-text
attributes.description: (optional) Custom error text displayed for the input.

attributes.name: filler-date
attributes.description: (optional) Filler date is used as fillers for parts not in the display format when constructing a full date string, for 'value'. It must be in the ISO String format YYYY-MM-DD. Default is {current year}-01-01.

attributes.name: format
attributes.description:
Format string for the date input. Default 'mm/dd/yyyy'.
Use 'm','mm' for month, 'd','dd' for date and 'yy','yyyy' for year with any separator that is not a regular expression.

attributes.name: helper-text
attributes.description: (optional) Custom helper text displayed below the input.

attributes.name: max
attributes.description: (optional) The maximum date allowed. The date is formatted according to ISO8601 'yyyy-mm-dd'.

attributes.name: min
attributes.description: (optional) The minimum date allowed. The date is formatted according to ISO8601 'yyyy-mm-dd'.

attributes.name: read-only
attributes.description: (optional) Whether the input's content is read-only

attributes.name: show-calendar-icon
attributes.description: (optional) Show a calendar icon. Note: Clicking on this icon will only emit an event `calendarIconClicked`.

attributes.name: type
attributes.description: (optional) Denotes what type of date and the types are 'start','end','single'. Required when using `modus-date-picker`.

attributes.name: value
attributes.description: (optional) A string representing the date entered to the input. The date is formatted according to ISO8601 'yyyy-mm-dd'. The displayed date format will differ from the 'value'.

attributes.name: animate-list
attributes.description: Whether to apply list opening animation.

attributes.name: placement
attributes.description: (optional) The placement of the dropdown in related to the toggleElement.

attributes.name: show-dropdown-list-border
attributes.description: (optional) Whether to show the dropdown list's border.

attributes.name: toggle-element-id
attributes.description: (required) The element id that the list renders near and that triggers the toggling of the list.

attributes.name: file-dragged-over-instructions
attributes.description: (optional) The dropzone's instruction text when a file is being dragged over.

attributes.name: include-state-icon
attributes.description: (optional) Whether to include the upload icon.

attributes.name: max-file-name-length
attributes.description: (optional) The dropzone's max file name length of each file.

attributes.name: max-total-file-size-bytes
attributes.description: (optional) The dropzone's max total file size.

attributes.name: multiple
attributes.description: (optional) Whether multiple files can be uploaded.

attributes.name: borderless
attributes.description: (optional) Whether the list item has a border or not

attributes.name: left-icon
attributes.description: (optional) Takes the icon name and shows the icon aligned to the left of the button text.

attributes.name: selected
attributes.description: (optional) The selected state of the list item

attributes.name: sub-text
attributes.description: (optional) Whether to show Subtext below the Slot content or not

attributes.name: wrap-sub-text
attributes.description: (optional) Whether to wrap the sub text.

attributes.name: backdrop
attributes.description: (optional) The modal's backdrop. Specify 'static' for a backdrop that doesn't close the modal when clicked outside the modal content

attributes.name: enable-search-overlay
attributes.description: (optional) Whether to show search overlay or not.

attributes.name: notification-count
attributes.description: (optional) Whether to show badge on top of notification

attributes.name: reverse
attributes.description: (optional) Whether to display the navbar items in reverse order.

attributes.name: show-apps-menu
attributes.description: (optional) Whether to show the apps menu.

attributes.name: show-main-menu
attributes.description: (optional) Whether to show the main menu.

attributes.name: show-pendo-placeholder
attributes.description: (optional) Whether to show the placeholder for Pendo.

attributes.name: show-shadow
attributes.description: (optional) Whether to show a shadow under the navbar.

attributes.name: helper-text
attributes.description: (optional) The input's helper text displayed below the input.

attributes.name: read-only
attributes.description: (optional) Whether the input's content is read-only

attributes.name: text
attributes.description: (optional) The text displayed on the progress bar.

attributes.name: checked-id
attributes.description: The ID of the checked radio button.

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: The radio button group name. Used to group individual radio elements into one group.

attributes.name: options-display-prop
attributes.description: The options property to render in the dropdown list.

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: (optional) Whether the sentiment scale is disabled.

attributes.name: type
attributes.description: The type of icons to be displayed.

attributes.name: collapse-on-click-outside
attributes.description: (optional) To choose whether to collapse the panel when clicked outside.

attributes.name: expanded
attributes.description: (optional) The expanded state of side navigation panel and items.

attributes.name: max-width
attributes.description: (optional) Maximum width of the side navigation panel in an expanded state.

attributes.name: mode
attributes.description: Mode to make side navigation either overlay or push the content for the selector specified in `targetContent`

attributes.name: target-content
attributes.description: (optional) Specify the selector for the page's content for which paddings and margins will be set by side navigation based on the `mode`.

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: (optional) The disabled state of side navigation panel item.

attributes.name: label
attributes.description: (optional) Label for the item and the tooltip message.

attributes.name: menu-icon
attributes.description: (optional) A built-in menu icon string or a image url.

attributes.name: selected
attributes.description: (optional) The selected state of side navigation panel item.

attributes.name: color
attributes.description: (optional) The color of the spinner. It can be a custom color or one of the variants  - primary, secondary, tertiary, dark, success, danger and warning.

attributes.name: size
attributes.description: (optional) The size of the spinner, will be applied to both the height and width

attributes.name: hover
attributes.description: (Optional) To enable row hover in table.

attributes.name: max-height
attributes.description: (Optional) To display a vertical scrollbar when the height is exceeded.

attributes.name: max-width
attributes.description: (Optional) To display a horizontal scrollbar when the width is exceeded.

attributes.name: show-sort-icon-on-hover
attributes.description: (Optional) To display sort icon on hover.

attributes.name: sort-icon-style
attributes.description: (Optional) To display a-z or arrow sort icons.

attributes.name: toolbar
attributes.description: (Optional) To display a toolbar for the table.

attributes.name: wrap-text
attributes.description: (Optional) To wrap text that overflows the cell.

description.value: ModusFillerColumn is to fill empty space within a table or grid when the content in other columns is not wide enough to occupy the entire available width

attributes.name: autocapitalize
attributes.description: (optional) Capitalization behavior when using a non-traditional keyboard (e.g. microphone, touch screen)

attributes.name: autocorrect
attributes.description: (optional) Whether to activate automatic correction while the user is editing this field in Safari.

attributes.name: clearable
attributes.description: (optional) Whether the input has a clear button.

attributes.name: enterkeyhint
attributes.description: (optional) Which action label to present for the enter key on virtual keyboards.

attributes.name: helper-text
attributes.description: (optional) The input's helper text displayed below the input.

attributes.name: include-error-icon
attributes.description: (optional) Whether the error icon is included.

attributes.name: include-password-text-toggle
attributes.description: (optional) Whether the password text toggle icon is included.

attributes.name: include-search-icon
attributes.description: (optional) Whether the search icon is included.

attributes.name: read-only
attributes.description: (optional) Whether the input's content is read-only

attributes.name: autocorrect
attributes.description: (optional) Whether to activate automatic correction while the user is editing this field in Safari.

attributes.name: clearable
attributes.description: (optional) Whether the input has a clear button.

attributes.name: enterkeyhint
attributes.description: (optional) Which action label to present for the enter key on virtual keyboards.

attributes.name: helper-text
attributes.description: (optional) The input's helper text displayed below the input.

attributes.name: read-only
attributes.description: (optional) Whether the input's content is read-only

attributes.name: allowed-chars-regex
attributes.description:
(optional) Regular expression to allow characters while typing the input.
Default is `/[\d:apm\s]/gi` or `/[\d:]/gi` based on the display format.

attributes.name: ampm
attributes.description: (optional) Sets 12/24 hour format for the input string.

attributes.name: auto-format
attributes.description: (optional) Formats the text while typing in the input field.

attributes.name: disable-validation
attributes.description: (optional) Disables default validation for the time input.

attributes.name: error-text
attributes.description: (optional) Custom error text displayed for the input.

attributes.name: helper-text
attributes.description: (optional) Custom helper text displayed below the input.

attributes.name: read-only
attributes.description: (optional) Whether the input's content is read-only

attributes.name: value
attributes.description: (optional) Value of the time entered into the input.

attributes.name: delay
attributes.description: (optional) Time taken to dismiss the toast

attributes.name: dismissible
attributes.description: (optional) Whether the toast has a dismiss button.

attributes.name: role
attributes.description: (optional) Role taken by the toast.  Defaults to 'status'.

attributes.name: show-icon
attributes.description: (optional) Whether to show the toasts' icon.

attributes.name: position
attributes.description: (optional) The tooltip's position relative to its content.

attributes.name: borderless
attributes.description: (optional) Whether the content tree and items have a border or not

attributes.name: checkbox-selection
attributes.description: (optional) Enables checkbox selection on each tree item

attributes.name: disable-tabbing
attributes.description: (optional) Disable usage of `tab` key to focus elements inside a tree view. Use `Arrow Up/Down` for focussing a tree item and `Shift + Arrow Right` for focussing a checkbox inside the item.

attributes.name: size
attributes.description: (optional) The default size of all tree items

attributes.name: draggable-item
attributes.description: (optional) Allows the item to be dragged across the tree

attributes.name: droppable-item
attributes.description: (optional) Allows the item to be a drop zone so other tree items can be dropped above it

attributes.name: editable
attributes.description: (optional) Changes the label field into a text box

attributes.name: is-last-child
attributes.description: To be set true when the tree item is an expandable last child

attributes.name: tab-index-value
attributes.description: (optional) Tab Index for the tree item

attributes.name: expanded
attributes.description: The panel is expanded or closed

attributes.name: push-content
attributes.description: Determines if the panel pushes content or displays an overlay.
